dmca.title: Content Infringement Notice

Content Infringement Notice
Attn: DMCA complaints
On behalf of
ArticleInsider.com
7/6/2005

Infosearch Media, inc. [private]
Marina Del Rey, CA 90292
Phone: [private] Fax: [private]
Attn: [private] at [private]@infosearchmedia.com

Incident#1
The copyrighted work at issue is the article "Deciding What Matters Most" by James Bruce posted on the Article Insider web site at http://motorcycles.articleinsider.com/11201_dot_helmet.html
Search Query: "To legally display the Dot insignia, all helmets must meet the same requirements." Infringing Web Pages: http://www.proz.com/?sp=h&id=672487
My email: [private]@infosearchmedia.com Address: Infosearch Media, Inc. [private] Marina Del Rey, CA 90292 Phone: [private]
Email of infringing website: N/A
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Signature
Fax to: [private]
